title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-2.5 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-2.5 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner shall establish uniform statistical reporting requirements for
school districts required to set aside a portion of the comprehensive operating
aid for attendance improvement and dropout prevention to apply in evaluating
improvement in attendance and student retention. (b) A city school district in a city having a
population of more than one million inhabitants shall file an interim report
with the commissioner by January 15th of the current year. The interim report
shall be in a form prescribed by the commissioner and shall contain such
information on the use of the setaside for attendance improvement and dropout
prevention as the commissioner shall require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
149-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
